#The following code adds a menu item per light in the scene to the bottom of the menu # which selects the respective light (or inspects it when ctrl key is pressed at the same time)
def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! self = oContext.ThisQMenuObject self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the mneu after subsequent calls Lights = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "light", "", True) oDummyMenuItem = Application.QMenuGetByName("MenuItem","Dummy_LightSelector") DummyCode = oDummyMenuItem.Code
for oLight in Lights: oLightMenuItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") LightSpecificCode = DummyCode.replace("LIGHTNAME", oLight.FullName) oLightMenuItem.Name = oLight.FullName oLightMenuItem.code = LightSpecificCode #Set the code in the Menu Item we have concatenated above self.appendTempMenuItem (oLightMenuItem) #Add the menu item to the list of temporary menu items of this menu
def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass

#The following code adds a menu item per camera in the scene to the bottom of the menu # which selects the respective light (or inspects it when ctrl key is pressed at the same time)
def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! self = oContext.ThisQMenuObject self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cameras = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "camera", "", True) oDummyMenuItem = Application.QMenuGetByName("MenuItem","Dummy_CameraSelector") DummyCode = oDummyMenuItem.Code
for oCam in Cameras: oCamMenuItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") CameraSpecificCode = DummyCode.replace("CAMNAME", oCam.FullName) oCamMenuItem.Name = oCam.FullName oCamMenuItem.Code = CameraSpecificCode #Set the code in the Menu Item we have concatenated above self.appendTempMenuItem (oCamMenuItem) #Add the menu item to the list of temporary menu items of this menu
def QMenu_Menu_Execute ( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass

def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! self = oContext.ThisQMenuObject self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cams = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "Light", "", True)
for oCam in Cams: if Application.GetValue(oCam.FullName + ".light.Type") == 2: oCamItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") oCamItem.Name = oCam.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute (oContext):
	oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" )
') Code+= ('	oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport")
') Code += ('	oVM.SetAttributeValue("activecamera:" + oView + "","' + oCam.FullName + '")
')
oCamItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)

def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! self = oContext.ThisQMenuObject self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cams = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "Camera", "", True)
for oCam in Cams: oCamItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") oCamItem.Name = oCam.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute ( oContext ):
	') Code += ('oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" )
	') Code += ('oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport")
	') Code += ('oVM.SetAttributeValue("activecamera:" + oView + "","' + oCam.FullName + '")
')
oCamItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)
